item.title: Yell commands
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

ive made my own yell commands so if an admin, mod, or owner does ::yell itll say [ADMIN] [MOD] or [OWNER] this is the code i used:

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[USER]"+playerName+": "+command.substring(5); } else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[MOD]"+playerName+": "+command.substring(5); } else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[ADMIN]"+playerName+": "+command.substring(5); } else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[OWNER]"+playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
but when i d the ::yell command in-game it still says just the playernameâ€¦

Read full topic
